comments.body: Here's where we see parameters being used as an object with the `[key: string]: any` signature: https://github.com/storybooks/storybook/blob/next/lib/core/src/client/preview/client_api.js#L112-L120

Here's where this method is defined: https://github.com/storybooks/storybook/blob/next/lib/core/src/client/preview/client_api.js#L92

And this line shows that `parameters` is optional: https://github.com/storybooks/storybook/blob/next/lib/core/src/client/preview/client_api.js#L111
Here's where the `addParameters` instance method is defined: https://github.com/storybooks/storybook/blob/next/lib/core/src/client/preview/client_api.js#L139-L142
And here is the top-level `clearDecorators` function: https://github.com/storybooks/storybook/blob/next/lib/core/src/client/preview/client_api.js#L55-L57
